Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Imanje se nalazi u selu u blizini Josipdola, uz glavnu cestu Karlovac - Senj , u Karlovačkoj županiji. Josipdol se nalazi 10 km jugoistočno od Ogulina . Ogulin ima prekrasan i povijesni kameni dvorac poznat kao Kula, te obližnju planinu Klek . Zgrada se nalazi između ceste i lijepogpotoka, okružena velikim drvećem. Vlasništvo The property has a spacious guesthouse, a barbecue and 2,179 m² of land. The guesthouse contains 10 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, and 2 kitchens. Both on the front and on the back of the guesthouse are large terraces. To the side of the guesthouse, along the stream, is a playground. On the other side is an additional building surrounded by two streams, with a large barbecue inside. A bridge crosses the stream, which leads to a fish pond, which can be put back into use. This property is ideal as a large family house, a guesthouse or a restaurant. Details The footprint of the guesthouse: 190 m² Total floor space of the guesthouse: 400 m² (est.) Land connected with main building: 2,179 m² Floors: Cellar, ground floor, and first floor Rooms: 12 Bedrooms: 10 Bathrooms: 4 Kitchens: 2 Balconies: 2 Terraces: 2 Gas: No Electricity: City mains Water: City mains Hot water: Electric boiler, central heating Heating: Central heating on pellets and wood Air conditioning: No Sewage: Cesspit/septic tank Walls: Hollow bricks with a facade Roof: Roofing tiles Floors: Tiles, laminate, and marble Windows: Eco double glazing with wooden and PVC frames Doors: Wooden with double glazing Staircases: Indoors, marble Cellar: Yes, with outdoor access Fence: Yes, not dog-proof Blinds: Yes Barbecue: Yes Furniture: Included Access: Asphalt Public transport: Bus, Train Location: In Josipdol.
